text: Kunaal Vermaa is an Indian lyricist and poet from Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. He is known for writing songs including Tum Hi Aana and Hasi Bangaye. == Discography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#cccccf; text-align:center;" | Year||Title || Movie || Record label|| Composer |- |2015 |Hasi |Hamari Adhuri Kahani |Sony Music India |Ami Mishra |- |rowspan="4"|2018 |Mummy Kasam |Nawabzaade |T-Series |Gurinder Seagal |- |Pal |Jalebi |Sony Music India |Javed-Mohsin |- |Saansain Hui Dhuan Dhuan |Race 3 |Tips Industries |Gurinder Seagal |- |"Mera Wala Dance |Simmba |rowspan="9"|T-Series |Lijo George-DJ Chetas |- |rowspan="5"|2019 |Tu Laung Main Elaachi |rowspan=2|Luka Chuppi | Tanishk Bagchi |- |Duniyaa | Abhijit Vaghani |- |Tu Mila To Haina |rowspan=2|De De Pyaar De |rowspan=2|Amaal Mallik |- |Chale Aana |- |Tum Hi Aana All Version |Marjaavaan | Payal Dev |- | rowspan="5" |2020 |Pind |Street Dancer 3D | Gurinder Seagal |- |Malang - Title Track |rowspan=2|Malang | Ved Sharma |- |Humraah | The Fusion Project |- |Jitthey Tu Jaaye |rowspan=2|Single |rowspan=2|iThinkSound |rowspan=2|Ayaz Ismail |- |Ho Na Juda |} ==Awards and nominations== {|class="wikitable" !Year !!
